summary.span: 作為充當目錄之所有區域控制項的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as catalogs.

summary.span: 目錄包含 控制項的清單，使用者可以將這些控制項加入網頁。

span.span: Catalogs contain lists of controls that users can add to a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是基底類別繼承自類別。The class is a base class that inherits from the class. 它衍生的區域提供一組基本的行為。It provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones. 類別會提供唯一的使用者介面 (UI)，可讓使用者將控制項和網頁的其他伺服器控制項。The class provides a unique user interface (UI) that enables users to add controls and other server controls to Web pages. 控制項是衍生自類別，例如，是實際放置在網頁的控制項。Controls that derive from the class, such as , are the controls actually placed on Web pages. 它們可做為其他控制項，又稱為容器建立清單的使用者新增至網頁伺服器控制項的控制項。They act as containers for other controls, known as controls, that create lists of server controls for users to add to a page. 衍生自區域類別都只有當頁面處於目錄顯示模式。Zones that derive from the class can appear only when the page is in catalog display mode. > [!NOTE] > A只能包含區域控制項，反之亦然，控制項可以只在位於區域。A zone can contain only controls, and conversely, controls can reside only in zones. 將伺服器控制項新增至目錄的機制是下列三個控制項衍生自基底的一組類別。The mechanism for adding server controls to a catalog is the following set of three controls that derive from the base class. |控制項Control|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||會維護 頁面已關閉的控制項的參考。Maintains references to controls that have been closed on a page. 這些控制項可以由使用者重新開啟 （已的重新新增到網頁）。These controls can be reopened (added back to the page) by users.| ||包含控制項中的 Web 組件類別目錄，在網頁標記中宣告的參考。Contains references to controls that are declared in a Web Parts catalog in the markup of a Web page. 這些控制項可以加入網頁的使用者。These controls can be added to a Web page by users.| ||提供使用者定義檔案上載至目錄，以便可以將控制項加入至網頁的 UI。Provides the UI for a user to upload a definition file to a catalog so that the control can be added to a Web page. 定義檔是 XML 檔案。匯入控制項設定網頁組件檔案名稱副檔名。Definition files are XML file with a .WebPart file name extension that import settings for a control. 控制項必須先存在於伺服器上可以匯入定義檔案。The control must be present on the server before the definition file can be imported.| 類別具有一些屬性可用於顯示類別目錄中，控制項。The class has a number of properties that are useful for displaying catalogs of controls. 屬性會參考從類別目錄中將選取的控制項，加入網頁，動詞命令時屬性參考動詞，而關閉目錄，並傳回至瀏覽模式的頁面的顯示模式。The property references the verb that adds a selected control from the catalog to the page, while the property references a verb that closes the catalog and returns the page's display mode to browse mode. 屬性參考的所有集合區域中的控制項。The property references the collection of all controls in the zone. 文字導向的數個屬性，例如， ，和，覆寫基底屬性，以提供適用於類別目錄的預設文字。Several text-oriented properties, such as , , and , override base properties to provide default text appropriate for catalogs. 屬性包含可讓使用者選擇哪一個區域的控制項將會新增至下拉式清單控制項旁的文字。The property contains the text alongside the drop-down list control that allows users to choose which zone a control will be added to. 數個其他屬性都包含在類別。Several other properties are included in the class. 屬性是在目前選取的唯一字串識別碼控制項。The property is a unique string identifier for the currently selected control. 屬性會指出是否要顯示的圖示，可以藉由設定與控制項相關聯屬性上的控制項。The property indicates whether to show the icons that can be associated with controls by setting the property on a control. 屬性包含連結的樣式屬性目前未選取的區域中的控制項。The property contains style attributes for the links to the controls that are not currently selected in the zone. 相反地，屬性包含連結的樣式屬性使用者目前選取的區域中的控制項。In contrast, the property contains style attributes for a link to the control that the user has currently selected in the zone. 除了屬性之外，也有一些方法類別，除了標準的事件處理和轉譯方法繼承自其他基底的控制項，唯一專用於處理的類別目錄控制項。In addition to the properties, there are also some methods in the class, in addition to the standard event-handling and rendering methods inherited from other base controls, which are uniquely designed for the purpose of handling catalogs of controls. 方法會建立 chrome （週邊 UI 項目框線、 動詞命令、 圖示和標題等） 括住每個控制項在區域中，而且還會處理控制項的呈現。The method creates the chrome (peripheral UI elements such as a border, verbs, icons, and a title) that surrounds each control in the zone, and also handles the rendering for the controls. 方法是抽象方法，衍生的類別覆寫它建立的所有執行個體區所包含的控制項。The method is an abstract method; derived classes override it to create instances of all the controls contained in the zone. 可以由衍生類別呼叫方法，如果集合區域變更，某些程式設計的原因，以及衍生的類別中的控制項需要重新建立集合。The method can be called by a derived class if the collection of controls in the zone changes for some programmatic reason, and the derived class needs to recreate the collection. 方法會載入先前已存在的狀態核取方塊旁控制項，在目錄中，每當頁面回傳至伺服器; 相反地，方法儲存狀態的核取方塊。The method loads the previously existing state for the check boxes next to the controls in the catalog, whenever the page is posted back to the server; conversely, the method saves the state of the check boxes. 最後，方法會提供每個連結的所有轉譯區所包含的控制項。Finally, the method provides all the rendering for the links to each control contained in the zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範數個宣告式和以程式設計方式使用類別。The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the class. 類別是抽象的因為程式碼範例會使用衍生隨附於 Web 組件控制項集合的屬性和它所繼承的方法來示範的類別類別。Because the class is abstract, the code examples use the derived class that ships with the Web Parts control set, demonstrating the properties and methods that it inherits from the class. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更網頁上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 包含參考的網頁控制項，以及一些程式碼，示範如何使用某個索引鍵類別成員。A Web page that contains a reference to a control, and some code that demonstrates usage of some key class members. - 自訂加入至自訂控制項控制項。A custom control that is added to the custom control. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的描述。A description of how the example works in a browser. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓您變更頁面上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables you to change display modes on the page. For 詳細資料會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#8)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是包含的宣告式參考的網頁控制項。The second part of the code example is a Web page that contains a declarative reference to a control. 頁面頂端附近是兩個`Register`指示詞，一個用於使用者控制項，而自訂的另一個控制項。Near the top of the page are two `Register` directives--one for the user control, and one for the custom control. 請注意，以下``項目``包含自訂的宣告式參考的項目控制項，以及 ASP.NET控制項。Notice that below the `` element is an `` element that contains declarative references to the custom control, and to an ASP.NET control. 區域也會有各種不同的標記，以判斷其外觀和行為設定的屬性。The zone also has a variety of tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior. 之間`

para.span: 如果您想要開發自訂的區域來裝載控制項，您必須判斷您是否要提供區域範本支援。

span.span: If you want to develop a custom zone for hosting controls, you must determine whether you want to provide zone template support.

para.span: 在區域樣板由實作的型別介面，以及如果您想要讓網頁開發人員使用您自訂的區域來參考，則需要您在網頁上的宣告式標記的區域內的控制項。

span.span: A zone template is created by types that implement the interface, and is necessary if you want to enable page developers using your custom zone to reference controls within your zone in the declarative markup of a Web page.

para.span: 如果您需要範本支援的區域，您應該繼承自類別。

span.span: If you need zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

para.span: 相反地，如果您自訂的區域並將其控制項將會各自獨立，它們不使用任何選項，以宣告方式在區域的範本中，指定控制項的網頁開發人員會以程式設計方式建立，然後您可以直接繼承從類別。

span.span: In contrast, if your custom zone and its controls are going to be self-contained, and they will be created programmatically without any options for page developers to specify controls declaratively in a zone template, then you can inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 如果您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫方法，並新增或您想要您目錄中其他伺服器控制項物件。

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you must override the method, and add the or other server controls you want in your catalog to a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別初始化時，例如呼叫建構函式Web 組件控制集所提供的類別。The constructor is called when a derived class is initialized, such as the class provided with the Web Parts control set. 基底建構函式可協助準備頁面以顯示 Web 組件類別目錄的使用者介面 (UI)，藉由傳遞適當物件到控制項。The base constructor helps prepare the page to display the Web Parts catalog user interface (UI), by passing the appropriate object to the control. 具體來說，建構函式傳遞物件。Specifically, the constructor passes a object.

span.span: A that enables end users to add controls from the catalog to a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Add 動詞由參考控制項上的屬性衍生自類別。The add verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. Add 動詞新增終端使用者在網頁上的目錄中選取的控制項。The add verb adds a control that an end user has selected in the catalog to a Web page. 一般而言，add 動詞會顯示在使用者介面 (UI) 中為控制項，雖然它也可以是連結或影像。Typically, the add verb appears in the user interface (UI) as a control, although it can also be a link or an image. Add 動詞是區域層級控制項，也就是說，雖然可能有數個目錄中的控制項，add 動詞適用於使用者所選取的所有控制項，並將它們新增至選取的區域。The add verb is a zone-level control, meaning that although there might be several controls in the catalog, the add verb applies to all the controls selected by the user and adds them to the selected zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範如何存取以宣告方式在網頁上的屬性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此範例可自訂動詞命令的文字。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何存取屬性以程式設計方式使用切換按鈕啟用或停用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#3)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**目錄**從下拉式清單中，切換至 類別目錄的顯示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 顯示類別目錄時，您可以在檢查的自訂的文字控制項加入動詞命令，而且您可以按一下 **啟用或停用的動詞命令**示範您可以透過程式設計方式存取套用動詞命令的按鈕。When the catalog is visible, you can examine the customized text on the control for the add verb, and you can click the **Enable or Disable Verbs** button to demonstrate that you can access the apply verb programmatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫方法，它會建立一個執行個體類別，而這個執行個體用來呈現的週邊使用者介面 (UI) 項目 （也稱為 「 chrome 」），所有區域中的控制項。When the method is called, it creates one instance of the class, and this instance is used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements (also called the chrome) for all controls in a zone. 個別之 chrome 項目的控制項包括其框線和標題的文字。The chrome elements for an individual control include its border and title text. Web 組件控制集所提供的控制項預設沒有頁首動詞命令。The controls provided with the Web Parts control set do not have header verbs by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會提供所有集合的參考區域中的控制項。The property provides a reference to a collection of all the controls in the zone. 它同時參考提供與 Web 組件控制項集合中，任何自訂控制項新增至區域的控制項。It references both the controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and any custom controls that are added to the zone. 另一種方法來存取時，一開始建立集合屬性和屬性呼叫方法。The collection is initially created when another method accesses the property, and the property calls the method. > [!NOTE] > 請注意任何加入至集合控制項的實作中方法必須有指派給其 ID 屬性的值，否則將會擲回例外狀況集合指派給屬性。Note that any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性，逐一查看集合，並列出所有識別碼區域中的控制項。The code example shows how to access the property, iterate through the collection, and list the IDs of all the controls in the zone. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會忽略任何目前選取的控制項，在目錄中。The method ignores any currently selected controls in the catalog. 它只需呼叫返回要瀏覽模式的 Web 網頁的控制項。It simply calls the control to return the Web page to browse mode.

value.span: ，可以讓使用者關閉 Web 網頁上的目錄 UI。

span.span: A that enables end users to close the catalog UI on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所參考的關閉動詞控制項上的屬性衍生自類別。The close verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 使用者可以按一下區域頁尾中的關閉動詞命令。User can click the close verb in the zone footer. 當使用者按一下的關閉動詞命令，任何使用者選取的控制項都會被忽略，目錄 UI 會關閉，並且頁面返回標準瀏覽模式。When the user clicks the close verb, any controls the user has selected are ignored, the catalog UI closes, and the page returns to normal browse mode. 關閉動詞命令是區域層級控制項，這表示其動作會套用在整個區域的層級。The close verb is a zone-level control, meaning that its action applies at the level of the whole zone. 當使用者按一下的關閉動詞命令時，會忽略任何已選取，但不是會加入至網頁的控制項，目錄會關閉，而頁面傳回至瀏覽模式。When a user clicks the close verb, any controls that have been selected but not added to the page are ignored, the catalog is closed, and the page returns to browse mode. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範如何存取以宣告方式在網頁上的屬性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 這個範例自訂動詞命令的屬性。This example customizes the property for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何存取屬性以程式設計方式使用切換按鈕啟用或停用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#3)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**目錄**從下拉式清單中，切換至 類別目錄的顯示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 當目錄是可見的依滑鼠指標置放**關閉** 按鈕，您可以看到它的工具提示中的描述文字。When the catalog is visible, by positioning your mouse pointer over the **Close** button, you can see its description text in a ToolTip. 您也可以按一下**啟用或停用的動詞命令**示範您可以透過程式設計方式存取的關閉動詞命令的按鈕。You can also click the **Enable or Disable Verbs** button to demonstrate that you can access the close verb programmatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法未提供任何實作。The method provides no implementation. 它用來在衍生類別中實作，應該用來建立集合的執行個體裝載的 Web 網頁進入目錄模式時，在區域中，所包含的控制項。It is intended to be implemented in a derived class, and should be used to create an instance of the collection of controls contained in a zone, whenever the hosting Web page enters catalog mode. 方法提供實作的其中一個範例方法。The method provides one example of an implementation of the method. > [!NOTE] > 請注意任何加入至集合控制項的實作中方法必須有指派給其 ID 屬性的值，否則將會擲回例外狀況集合指派給屬性。Note that any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. 這個方法可以建立從數個來源的控制項： 宣告中的持續性格式的控制項控制項或在不同的儲存機制，例如 XML 檔案或資料庫中保存的控制項。The method can create the controls from several sources: controls that are declared in persistence format within a control, or controls that are persisted in various storage mechanisms, such as an XML file or a database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 區域，連結會顯示每一種控制項： ， ，和。In a zone, links are displayed for each type of control: , , and . 當使用者按一下其中一個連結，對應控制項成為選取的控制項，並包含由該所選控制項的子控制項成為可見。When a user clicks one of the links, the corresponding control becomes the selected control, and the child controls contained by that selected control become visible. 所參考的物件屬性包含的樣式屬性目前未選取的控制項。The object referenced by the property contains the style attributes for the controls that are not currently selected. 屬性所參考的物件是唯讀的雖然您仍然可用來設定基礎的樣式特性，如未選取控制項。Although the object referenced by the property is read-only, you can still use it to set the underlying style characteristics for the unselected controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 請注意，在程式碼範例的第一個部分會宣告兩個``項目，以及第一個宣告的值屬性。Notice that the first part of the code example declares two `` elements, and the first one declares a value for the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 在第二個部分的程式碼範例中，文字色彩的未選取控制項設定為不同的值。In the second part of the code example, the text color for the unselected controls is set to a different value. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#7)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**目錄**從下拉式清單中，切換至 類別目錄的顯示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 顯示類別目錄時，會注意到未選取的樣式屬性區域中所列的控制項 (根據預設，所選控制項是控制項)。When the catalog is visible, notice the style attributes of the unselected controls listed in the zone (by default, the selected control is the control). 您可以按一下**變更組件連結樣式**按鈕來變更未選取的控制項的文字色彩。You can click the **Change Part Link Styles** button to change the text color of the unselected controls. 您也可以按一下連結以取得未選取的控制項，若要查看的樣式屬性如何變更選取的控制項時。You can also click the links for the unselected controls, to see how the style attributes change when a control is selected.

span.span: Carries out the actions associated with one of the zone verbs, or raises an event that posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`eventArgument`參數的資料指出，add 動詞或關閉的動詞命令已按下，則方法執行的動作相關聯的動詞，例如新增控制項頁面上，或關閉目錄。If the `eventArgument` parameter data indicates that the add verb or the close verb was clicked, then the method carries out the action associated with the verb, such as adding controls to the page, or closing the catalog. 如果任何其他原因，要呼叫這個方法，來引發回傳事件到伺服器叫用基底方法。If the method is being called for any other reason, then the base method is invoked to raise a postback event to the server.

para.span: 如果您想要新增自訂動詞區域中，您需要覆寫方法來處理事件，如果使用者按一下自訂動詞命令。

summary.span: 覆寫基底方法以呈現繼承自 類別之區域的主體區域。

span.span: Overrides the base method to render the body area of a zone derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呈現的主體區域區域，這是在頁首和頁尾區域之間的主要內容區域，並包含控制項。The method renders the body area of a zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains controls. 方法會覆寫中的基底方法類別，以提供位址配置和樣式的特製化的呈現屬性 (attribute) 只會套用到區域。The method overrides the base method in the class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply only to zones. 此方法會呈現資料表，其中包含的整個內容的內文，並在該資料表中，設定不同的屬性值，根據各種條件，包括多少控制項是在區域中。The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including how many controls are in the zone. 如果有多個控制項，為每個控制項，建立連結，並顯示目前選取之控制項的內容。If there are multiple controls, a link is created for each control, and only the contents of the currently selected control are displayed. 特殊的樣式屬性中設定針對選取的屬性控制項與目前未選取的項目。Special style attributes are set in the property for the selected control versus the ones that are not currently selected. 如果有任何在區域中，控制項方法會呈現的值屬性。If there are no controls in the zone, the method renders the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈現連結至個別控制區域中，如果有多個控制項。The method renders links to the individual controls in a zone if there are multiple controls. 目前選取的連結控制項不同的方式呈現，以便未選取的控制項突出。The link for the currently selected control is rendered differently so that it stands out from the unselected controls. 開發人員可以使用設定的選取或未選取的控制項連結的樣式屬性和屬性，分別。Developers can set the style attributes for the selected and unselected control links by using the and properties, respectively. 若要連結區域中的控制項不是導覽; 適用於顯示使用者介面 (UI) 的控制項。The links to the controls in a zone are not navigational; they are for displaying the user interface (UI) of the controls. 當使用者按一下控制項的連結時，隱藏的任何其他顯示控制項的 UI，並會顯示所選控制項的 UI。When a user clicks the link for a control, the UI for any other displayed control is hidden, and the UI for the selected control is displayed.

para.span: 如果您建立自訂的類別繼承自類別，您可以選擇性地覆寫方法。

para.span: 這個方法可讓您以程式設計方式控制如何連結呈現區域中的控制項。

span.span: This method gives you programmatic control over how the links to controls in your zone are rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁尾的區域是包含區域層次動詞命令，例如 add 動詞和關閉的動詞命令之區域的底部區域。The footer of a zone is the bottom area of the zone that contains the zone-level verbs such as the add verb and the close verb. 在基礎的標記中，頁尾會是只是以 HTML 表格的儲存格。In the underlying markup, a footer is simply a cell in an HTML table. 方法會先建立頁尾中，樣式屬性，然後呼叫呈現新增並關閉動詞命令的方法。The method first creates the style attributes for the footer, and then calls the method to render the add and close verbs.

summary.span: 儲存在 Web 網頁回傳至伺服器以後發生的任何 控制項狀態變更。

span.span: Saves any changes in a control's state that occur after the Web page is posted back to the server.
An that contains the state data for the control.

returns.span: 如果狀態沒有變更，方法就會傳回 。

span.span: If there have been no changes to the state, the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法而言是不可或缺的控制項的作業 （例如索引或關鍵字），也不同於控制項的檢視狀態資料的狀態資料。The method is concerned with state data that is essential for a control's operation (such as an index or keyword) and is separate from the control's view-state data. 方法會先呼叫基底方法，以儲存控制項的現有狀態資料。The method first calls the base method to save the existing state data for the control. 接下來，它會判斷是否目前選取的區域中的控制項，藉由檢查是否屬性有值。Next, it determines whether a control in the zone is currently selected, by checking whether the property has a value. 如果沒有選取的控制項，方法與狀態資料從選取的控制項，更新現有的狀態資料，並傳回所有的狀態資料。If there is a selected control, the method updates the existing state data with the state data from the selected control, and then returns all the state data.

para.span: 您可以選擇性地覆寫衍生類別中的方法，讓您可以更新該區域中的其他自訂物件的已儲存的控制項狀態。

span.span: You can optionally override the method in a derived class so that you can update the saved control state for other custom objects in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫基底的方法，以儲存相關聯的檢視狀態區域。The method calls the base method to save the view state associated with the zone. 接下來，它會將儲存的新增和關閉的動詞，以及任何檢視狀態相關聯的物件而屬性。Next, it saves any view state for the add and close verbs, as well as for the objects associated with the and the properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您設定目前選取您選擇的識別項控制項。The property allows you to set an identifier of your choice for the currently selected control. 這不會變更控制項的屬性值，因此您可以使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式供您自己。This does not change the control's property value, so you can use this property for your own programmatic purposes. 例如，如果您想要一律執行一些程式設計動作上目前所選控制項，這個屬性可以可讓您存取該控制項，透過您在預先設定的已知值。For example, if you wanted to always carry out some programmatic action on the currently selected control, this property enables you to access that control through a known value that you set in advance. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 請注意，在程式碼範例的第一個部分會宣告兩個``項目，以及第一個宣告的值屬性。Notice that the first part of the code example declares two `` elements, and the first one declares a value for the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 在第二個部分的程式碼範例中，將文字值顯示目前選取的控制項屬性。In the second part of the code example, the text value for the property of the currently selected control is displayed. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#6)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**目錄**從下拉式清單中，切換至 類別目錄的顯示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 顯示類別目錄時，按一下其中一個連結，控制項以選取它。When the catalog is visible, click one of the links to a control to select it. 然後按一下**顯示選取之 CatalogPart 識別碼** 按鈕以顯示屬性值。Then click the **Show Selected CatalogPart ID** button to display the property value. 請注意，屬性的值以宣告方式設定區域的值。Notice that the value of the property is the value that was set declaratively for the zone. 如果您選取另區域中的控制項，相同的值會變成值選取時，每個控制項的屬性。If you select the other controls in the zone, the same value becomes the value of the property for each control when it is selected. 如果您未設定的值屬性，預設值一律是值目前所選控制項的屬性。If you do not set the value of the property, the default value is always the value of the property for the currently selected control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在目錄 UI 第一次出現時，使用者可以選取其中一個控制項，例如，其中包含或其他伺服器控制項可加入至網頁。When the catalog UI first appears, users can select one of the controls, such as , that contains or other server controls that can be added to the Web page. 使用者選取一或多個控制項，並可以再使用控制類別目錄的頁尾區域中，並且選擇在其中放置選取的伺服器控制項的頁面上的控制項。The user selects one or more controls, and can then use the control in the footer area of the catalog and choose the control on the page in which to place the selected server controls. 文字值屬性會顯示與控制為簡單的指示。The text value of the property is displayed alongside the control as a simple instruction. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 請注意，在程式碼範例的第一個部分會宣告兩個``項目，以及第一個宣告的值屬性。Notice that the first part of the code example declares two `` elements, and the first one declares a value for the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 在 程式碼範例中，值的第二個部分屬性以程式設計方式變更。In the second part of the code example, the value of the property is changed programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#5)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**目錄**從下拉式清單中，切換至 類別目錄的顯示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 顯示類別目錄時，請注意一起顯示的文字控制項中頁尾的目錄。When the catalog is visible, note the text displayed alongside the control in the footer of the catalog. 您可以按一下**設定區域的文字內容**按鈕來變更屬性的文字值。You can click the **Set Zone Text Properties** button to change the text value of the property.
